alert.note: Alert for Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 8:35AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 915 AM MST... At 835 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Estrella Sailport, or 24 miles southwest of Sun Lakes, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chandler, Casa Grande, Sun Lakes, Maricopa, Bapchule, Olberg, Ak- Chin Village, Sacaton, Santan and Stanfield. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 169 and 189. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 147 and 148. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 153 and 161. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; West Pinal County
